name: Kingdom!
description:
KINGDOM

Small game based on 3 levels and 2 bosses. It is a small one which we hope will go further.
It is controlled with W A S D, you attack with Space and you use items with the E

Kingdom is an adventure game oriented in a fantastic world where you will have to save the princess after overcoming the difficulties of the road, jump attack and survive to save your princess.

-Adventure
-RPG
-Fantasy
- Pixel
- Platforms
